seller_description: Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner effectively eliminates 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including the COVID-19 virus (SARS-CoV-2) on hard, non-porous surfaces in just 2 minutes (EPA Reg 777-66). This disinfecting spray not only provides a deep clean by eliminating germs, removing soap scum, and cutting through tough grease and grime but also deodorizes with a refreshing tropical Mango and Hibiscus scent. Versatile and convenient, it can be used on multiple hard surfaces throughout the home, including the kitchen and bathroom. As a trusted leader in disinfection, Lysol offers a range of great products, including disinfecting wipes, sprays, and all-purpose cleaners, for all your cleaning needs.
review: Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner is the gold standard for maintaining a spotless and germ-free home! Its ability to eliminate 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including COVID-19, ensures ultimate hygiene, while its delightful scents like Lemon Breeze and Mango Hibiscus make cleaning a refreshing experience. Perfect for tackling tough grime, grease, and soap scum on hard surfaces, it combines power and versatility to handle any cleaning challenge with ease. A reliable, pleasant-smelling disinfectant, it’s a must-have for every household!
Expected_output: The seller highlights Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner as a powerful cleaning solution designed to kill 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including COVID-19, within a short period on hard, non-porous surfaces. Promoting both functionality and fragrance, the product is available in delightful scents like Lemon Breeze and Mango & Hibiscus. The seller's images emphasize its germ-killing capabilities and refreshing scents, presenting the product with bright and clear packaging. The buyer’s images confirm receipt of the correct products, showing identical packaging and branding that match the seller’s description and visuals. The items are in excellent condition, with no observable discrepancies between what was advertised and delivered. The absence of a detailed performance review from the buyer is offset by the product’s strong alignment with the seller’s claims. In conclusion, the transaction successfully fulfills the seller’s promises, with accurate product delivery that aligns perfectly with the advertised features. The combination of effective cleaning power, pleasant scents, and well-packaged delivery ensures a positive experience, demonstrating the seller’s reliability and attention to quality.
label: -1: buyers opinion
